Interface FedoraSession


  • public interface FedoraSession
    The Fedora Session abstraction
    Author:
    acoburn

        Update the expiry by the provided amount

        Returns:

        Get the date this session expires

      • addSessionData

        void addSessionData(String key,
                    String value)
        Add session-specific data
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value Note: it is up to the particular implementation as to whether multi-valued session data is allowed.
